attributes.action: To put Affirmations into primary schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am asking the government to take direct action and  put affirmations into primary scchools
using affirmations in primary schools  will cut down on bullying, it will cut down on racism
it will cut down on crime, it will save the country billions of pounds
this idea has been around for centuries but the government has fail to see the unlimited potential of it.affirmations can be done in ten minutes each morning
this is a guide line how affirmations are done
i love and respect myself
i love and respect my parent
i love and respect my classmates
i love and respect all the children in my school
i love and respect all the children in the world
